column2: "Excellent. I see you're one of the good ones. My fears were completely unfounded, then."
"There are some really rare abilities out there, but they won't always be on the weapon you want."
"That's why you've got to add Special Abilities. You take something special from one item, and give it to another."
"The more you do it, the lower your success rate, but hey, the reward is worth the risk."
"Heh. This reminds me of this one time back in the day, when I tried to add Special Abilities to my..."
